name: Fireflies (itch) (ThePieFace)
description:
This was a game made in Jan 2021 for the Global Game Jam 2021

You're in the dark woods with nothing but fireflies to help light your way as you search for your escaped rabbits. W,A,S,D or Arrow Key movement Catch Fireflies and Rabbits with the E key (Unfortunately there is no controller support)
